name: Gugalanna
languages: Understands but can't speak, telepathy 120 ft.
immune: fire, radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Flyby
text: Gugalanna doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: Gugalanna has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
text: If Gugalanna moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a horns attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 22 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, Gugalanna can make one kick attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Gugalanna makes two attacks. one with its horns and one with its kick.

action.name: Horns
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 34 (5d10 + 7) piercing damage and 14 (4d6) fire damage.

action.name: Kick
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 18 (2d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

The celestial can take 4 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The celestial regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Options
text: Gugalanna can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Gugalanna regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary.name: Rearing Stomp (Costs 2 Actions)
text: Gugalanna spreads his wings and stomps his hooves, shaking the earth. Each creature within 10 feet of Gugalanna must make a DC 22 Strength saving throw.

On a failure, a target takes 18 (2d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage and is pushed 20 feet away from Gugalanna. On a success, a target takes half the damage and isn't pushed. Gugalanna can then fly up to half his flying speed.

legendary.name: Blazing Sun Disc (Costs 2 Actions, Recharge 5-6)
text: The sun disc floating between Gugalanna's horns flares. Each creature within 30 feet of Gugalanna must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
